Index >  SourceCount

SourceCount

Description

Returns how many sources are available on the local system. This is a read-only property.

Data type

<short>

Syntax

.SourceCount

Remarks

If SourceCount returns 0, it means there is no source available to use on the system.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

OpenSourceManager()
SelectSource()
SelectSourceByIndex()
